column2: 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 1 to 6 months (Patient)
column9: 57 yo male suffering from ED for 2 yrs related to diabetes. Was rarely able to have a full erection and had gotten very frustrated losing hardness before or during intercourse with wife. My wife says I am bigger and harder than she can remember (married 30+ years). The erection lasts through intercourse. There is a carryover effect often and can acheive good erections later that evening and sometimes next morning without additional dose. This works best in mornings on an empty stomach. Much less effective in evening on a full stomach. So eat light or use in mornings.It has given me a huge boost to my self esteem, much more than I expected. I was beginning to think that normal intercourse was a thing of the past.There are some side effects. I almost always get some nasal congestion which is annoying but tolerable. There is also some flushing to face and ears about half the time, but it doesn't persist for all that long. Very rarely a mild headache. Despite these side effects this has been a wonder drug for me.

We "completed relations" from start to finish four times the first time I used it. And amazingly, I was still ready to function the next morning and evening with very minor stimulation. When I was a teeneager I never had that kind of man power. I felt like a porno star, a total stud. Now the bad news... I experienced facial flushing, an annoying stuffy nose, intense sweating(especially during the summer months). The last dose I had caused such physical misery afterwards I felt as if I was going to die before morning came. It felt like the flu. I have learned to keep drinking a lot of water as the drug seems to make me feel overheated and dehydrated very easily. The worst side effect is severe heartburn the next day unlike anything I have ever experienced. I am considering using a pill splitter for the next dosage I take because I am wondering if a 20mg pill is causing a low level overdose or at least bad reaction from too much medicine. All in all even with the side effects as long as I don't experience any severe-severe-severe trouble it's worth it since it has restored my sexual prowess and allowed me to become a mattress god once again.

Do not have heart or any other difficulties, but this after-effect causes concern as far as whether or not the pressure is creating any sort of vascular problems in the head (possibility of strokes, etc. down the road.) Overall, satisfaction is tremendous and the ability to remain erect makes our whole sexual experience more fulfilling.

column9: Product is very pricey.  Generic wold be great! This drug works well for me with no side affects. 1/2 hr before sex is plenty of time. However, Never, Never use and drink anything with grapefruit or other citrus acids in it! This also includes sodas. Drug does not work, and you will receive a terrible headache!

column9: As with another reviewer, I've experienced severe nasal congestion.  Have been using for about one month and switched from Cialis after having severe nasal congestion with that drug too.  Thought a different compound would eliminate the side effect but it hasn't.  Use it about once/week.  Has anyone had nasal congestion while using ED drugs and been able to find one that doesn't cause congestion?
